mapper.insert: insert into GQPTZ_BXPHMSB (GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, YFSBXPH, YCBXPHMS, FZCS, AQDJ, ZYWHDX) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yfsbxph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ycbxphms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fzcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aqdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zywhdx,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
